title: Petroglyph National Monument: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth      Junior Ranger and Senior Ranger Programs Petroglyph National Monument offers two activity booklets for visiting families. Depending upon grade level and/or age, those children visiting the monument may pick up a Junior Ranger or Senior Ranger activity book at the Visitor Center. Upon completing a number of activities children will be awarded their Junior or Senior Ranger badge, patch, and a certificate. The National Park Service does offer a internet-based national Junior Ranger program entitled WebRangers. Please visit  http://www.nps.gov/webrangers/ to begin your national park adventure today.
